conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a faithful isometric cutaway. However, the image has been horizontally flipped compared to the input floor plan's orientation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear geometry and clean cutaway. Slight marks off for minor perspective flattening.

geometric_accuracy.notes: The layout is mirrored (horizontal flip). Room count and adjacencies are correct, but certain internal partitions have slight length discrepancies.

interior_elements.notes: Mirroring affects furniture position. Most major items (beds, table) are present and correctly scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: High quality 'clay' render style. Walls and openings are very readable. Clean background.

detected_errors.description: The entire 3D model is rendered as a mirror image (horizontal flip) of the original 2D floor plan.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D conversion that accurately interprets the architectural layout, though the final render is a mirrored version of the source plan.
